rules_text:
When Watchful Herder enters the battlefield, it deals damage to target creature or planeswalker equal to the number of tapped creatures you control.
Homestead {1}{W}{W} [i]({1}{W}{W}: Exile this card from your hand as a sorcery. Cast it on a later turn by tapping untapped creatures you control with total power greater than or equal to its mana value.)[/i]
